name: Schoology: Reloaded
description:
The official Schoology: Reloaded theme for LTHS. Makes it much easier on the eyes.

Recommended userscript: Install
Note: If you're unfamiliar with userscripts, you will need Greasemonkey or Tampermonkey to use them.
If you didn't enable "Using userscript?" in the style settings before, you can get it here.

user.about: I like to tinker with all sorts of things and make lots of scripts. If you'd like to contact me, I'm Joe ðŸŽ¸#7070 on Discord. (The place that I chat most is here.) One of the most popular things I've made is a Discord bot, Bender.

obsoletion_message: Unusable for anyone that's searching for it. This was uploaded mainly for personal use.
additional_info:
For student Schoology only. I'm not a teacher nor an admin.
If you're not here from LTHS, this style will likely be incomplete.

Changes:
v2.3 - Background images! Also, the userscript that was promised long ago (see description.)
v2.2 - support for userscript to be released soon
v2.1 - images redone: swapped with base64 or imgur + custom images
v2.0 - complete overhaul: transitions, transparency, custom colors, optimization etc.
v1.3 - first complete version
